summary: A Los Angeles bank assistant-manager devises a plan to steal money from the bank's vault and to flee to Brazil with his unsuspecting wife.
cast: Joseph Cotten|Teresa Wright|Jonathan Hale|Walter Sande|Eddie Marr|Carleton Young|Katherine Warren|Tom Powers|Stephanie King|Aline Towne|Hugh Sanders|Marjorie Stapp|William Hudson|Marjorie Bennett|Ralph Brooks|Benny Burt|Charles Collins|James Conaty|Dick Crockett|Franklyn Farnum|Sam Flint|Gil Frye|James Gonzalez|Stuart Hall|Sam Harris|Ed Hinton|Helen Humes|Freda Jones|Romy King|Guy Kingsford|Joseph La Cava|George Magrill|Joel Marston|Kurt Martell|Hans Moebus|Ed Nelson|Paul Ravel|Joey Ray|Michael Ross|Cosmo Sardo|Jeffrey Sayre|Bert Stevens
title: Trampa de acero
